note.p: Education: Friends' School, Ackworth; University of Durham College of Medicine. LSA, MD (1876, St Andrews), MD (1876, Durham ad eundem)
Career: Practised in Gateshead (1857-1906); Professor of Natural History, Armstrong College, Newcastle (1875-1906); wrote reports on the Ostracoda and Copepoda of the Challenger Expedition
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1922 vol 93 pp xx-xxiii, plate, signed by T R R S
